columns.name: vpn_gateway_id
columns.description: The ID of the virtual private gateway.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The current state of the virtual private gateway.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of VPN connection the virtual private gateway supports.

columns.name: amazon_side_asn
columns.description: The private Autonomous System Number (ASN) for the Amazon side of a BGP session.

columns.name: availability_zone
columns.description: The Availability Zone where the virtual private gateway was created, if applicable. This field may be empty or not returned.

columns.name: vpc_attachments
columns.description: Any VPCs attached to the virtual private gateway.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags that are attached to VPN gateway.
